sentences.sentence: RESULTS the different standards of factor are different to the influence level of friability.
sentences.translation: 结果因素的不同水平对脆碎度的影响程度不同。

sentences.sentence: And all of a sudden in the twentieth century came the discovery of its fragility and friability.
sentences.translation: 然而一夜之间，但到了二十世纪，这力量的脆弱被发现。

sentences.sentence: Objective: To improve its disintegration time limited and friability and make sure the quality of the production.
sentences.translation: 目的：提高其崩解时限及脆碎度，确保产品质量。
